p: Monthly means of atmospheric CO 2 concentration at Point Barrow (71.3째N, 203.4째E) and Alert Nunavut (82.5째N, 297.7째E) are taken from the Global Monitoring Division measurement datasets ( co2_brw_surface-insitu_1_ccgg_MonthlyData respectively co2_alt_surface-flask_1_ccgg_month) provided by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration/Earth System Research Laboratory (NOAA/ESRL). Global monthly means of atmospheric CO 2 concentration are taken from the GLOBALVIEW-CO2 product (obspack_co2_1_GLOBALVIEWplus_v2.1_2016_09_02; for details see 10.15138/G3259Z) also available at NOAA/ESRL.
